name: KoGaMa Forums - Dark Theme
description: Ever explored the KoGaMa Forums at night? If so, have you ever wanted a theme that didn't burn your eyes? Well, now there is one!
additional_info:
v1.1 (09/07/2017)
* Fixed threads
* Fixed thread creation page
* Fixed code blocks
* Fixed quote blocks

v1.0 (09/07/2017)
Basic dark theme released.
Feedback and suggestions appreciated.

Hope you enjoy! Keep your eyes safe, people! Don't burn 'em out!
